title: Staying Connected
creator_credit: Roberto Salvatore, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
brief_description: Meet Stephen Giles, a Caramut local, who now lives and works in the city but remains connected to the town through the Caramut Football Club, which he started playing for when he was 8 years old. He is now a patron of the club, just like his father was, and has helped the community to keep it alive, recognising its importance to the locals. He even puts on the footy boots again to play in the Seniors League.
